channel.title: Club Penguin Sea
channel.description: Recent content on Club Penguin Sea

item.title: About
item.description: We’re making our own tribute to Disney’s Club Penguin Island. It’s just for fun and to learn about making games and coding. We’re using the Unity engine and hand-drawn art. We are: Ben, seven years old: Producer, Director, Lead Artist. Mark, many years old: Lead Coder and Breaker of Builds. We’ll be using this blog to share updates and things we learn as we work on our project.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello! Just getting the blog up and running.
